      void getOrderReport(java.time.LocalDate date, java.math.BigInteger storeID)
      The function sends a request to the server to facilitate all Orders in the requested date period.
      void handleGet(java.util.ArrayList<OrderReport> oReports)
      This function is intended to receive the data from the server and send them to the appropriate GUI class in this situation it will sent to setOrderReports in ReportSelectorGUIController

      • initproduceOrderReport

        public void initproduceOrderReport(java.time.LocalDate date,
                                   java.math.BigInteger storeID)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: IOrderReportController

        This function is designed to prevent two requests of the same type from being overridden. It simply resets the parameters and calls for produceOrderReport

        Specified by:
        initproduceOrderReport in interface IOrderReportController
        Parameters:
        date - - The date that the quarter will be calculate, this date minus 3 months.
        storeID - - The store that the report was created for.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - - Context.clientConsole.handleMessageFromClientUI throws IOException.
        See Also:
        produceOrderReport

      • handleGet

        public void handleGet(java.util.ArrayList<OrderReport> oReports)
        Description copied from interface: IOrderReportController
        This function is intended to receive the data from the server and send them to the appropriate GUI class in this situation it will sent to setOrderReports in ReportSelectorGUIController
        Specified by:
        handleGet in interface IOrderReportController
        Parameters:
        oReports - - Arraylist of Order reports that back from the server

      • getOrderReport

        public void getOrderReport(java.time.LocalDate date,
                           java.math.BigInteger storeID)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: IOrderReportController

        The function sends a request to the server to facilitate all Orders in the requested date period.

        Specified by:

        date - - The date that the quarter will be calculate, this date minus 3 months.
        storeID - - The storeID of the store that the report was created for.
